SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.uid) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.uid , AA.agency_uid , AA.brand_uid , AA.lookbook_uid , AA.product_name , AA.product_number , AA.product_price , AA.product_unset_price , AA.category_uid , AA.sex , AA.memo , AA.caution , AA.tag , AA.option , AA.option_size_uid , AA.option_size_view , AA.option_color , AA.option_color_view , AA.option_add_date , AA.image , AA.image_width , AA.image_height
, AA.RequestID , BB.Status , BB.RequestDate
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsProduct AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsRequest BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.RequestID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.RequestID = #RequestID#
AND AA.agency_uid = #AgencyUid#
AND AA.brand_uid = #BrandUid#
AND AA.lookbook_uid = #LookbookUid#
AND AA.category_uid = #CategoryUid#
AND ( AA.product_nmae LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR AA.product_number LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsProduct AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsProduct AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.uid = #uid#
